synopsis.text: The anime spotlights the comical and authentic daily lives of high school boys, with a particular focus on Tadakuni, Hidenori, Yoshitake, and their peers at Sanada North High School. The boys grapple with a myriad of everyday dilemmas, from deciphering the enigma of girls to navigating the complexities of chivalry and pranks. The unaired episodes, released on DVDs and BDs, offer a deeper dive into the boys' humorous predicaments, covering topics such as ideals, loneliness, zippers, tricks, hiccups, and consideration. Despite their seemingly mundane existence, the high school boys' lives are far from dull, offering viewers a relatable and entertaining glimpse into the trials and tribulations of adolescence.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
